text: Sevak Ruben or Ruben Sevak (February 15, 1885 â€“ August 26, 1915) was an Armenian poet a prose-writer, and a doctor. Among many others, he was arrested on April 24, 1915 and killed on August 26, 1915 during the Armenian Genocide. Category:Armenian poets Category:1885 births Category:1915 deaths
title: Ruben Sevak
